Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.cookies

Class AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier

java.lang.Object
ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.SequentialActionSupplier<HttpStepContext,​List<HttpCookie>,​AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier>
ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.cookies.AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<Action<HttpStepContext>>, StepParameterPojo
public final class AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier extends SequentialActionSupplier<HttpStepContext,​List<HttpCookie>,​AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier>
This class is designed to build an action that adds cookies to a "cookie jar".

  • Method Details

    • addHttpCookies

      public static AddHttpCookiesActionSupplier addHttpCookies​(URI uri, List<HttpCookie> cookies)
      Creates a step action that adds all the defined cookies to cookie jar.
      Parameters:
      uri - the uri these cookies associated with. if null, then cookies are not associated with an URI
      cookies - cookies to be added
      Returns:
      self-reference
